downloadTitle: Introduction to Microsoft Teams Rooms - Module 1
downloadDescription: Learn about what Teams Devices are and how Teams Rooms fits into the Teams devices offering.

downloadFile.name: Module 1 - Introduction to Microsoft Teams Rooms.pptx

detailsSection: Microsoft Teams is the most intuitive way to connect, collaborate, and create, in real time or asynchronously, helping you accomplish more together. Learn about what Teams Devices are and how Teams Rooms fits into the Teams devices offering, and how Hybrid Meetings provides a full and comprehensive solution for your hybrid needs.
detailsSection_file_name: Module 1 - Introduction to Microsoft Teams Rooms.pptx
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
